## f0 and l0

### P1

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
mami_codi_harmonics <- function(h) mami.codi(c(60), verbose=T, num_harmonics = h)
1:20  %>% purrr::map_dfr(mami_codi_harmonics) %>% 
  dplyr::select(f0,l0)
```

### P4

```{r, echo=F, message=F}
mami_codi_harmonics <- function(h) mami.codi(c(60,65), verbose=T, num_harmonics = h)
1:20  %>% purrr::map_dfr(mami_codi_harmonics) %>% 
  dplyr::select(f0,l0)
```
